entity.description: US Secretary of Agriculture Sonny Perdue

text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall What the hell has taken you so long? How much food have you allowed to be trashed.
This delayed response is just like your coronavirus response! How many people have you let die? It's criminal! And it will be your legacy.
